original_text: You multiplied their children as the stars of heaven, and you brought them into the land that you had told their fathers to enter and possess.
korean_text: 주께서 그들의 자손을 하늘의 별같이 많게 하시고 전에 그들의 열조에게 들어가서 차지하라고 말씀하신 땅으로 인도하여 이르게 하셨으므로

sentences.original_text: You multiplied their children as the stars of heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그들의 자녀를 하늘의 별처럼 많게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: and you brought them into the land
that you had told their fathers
